attributes.action: ask the BBC to revoke their decision to employ Steve McClaren as an expert summariser at Euro 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Steve McClaren failed in his job and let the country down when the England football team in his charge failed to qualify for the Euro 2008 tournament

As a result of that, not only do the country's football followers not have their team to support this summer, but many companies' profits have been hit and jobs lost as a direct result

It is staggering that the BBC have now seen fit to employ him as an expert summariser for the tournament - this shows no regard for the feelings of the licence-fee payers who will ultimately be rewarding him for failure, bearing in mind also that he has already received a substantial pay-off from the FA

We ask the PM to intervene and ask the BBC to revoke the contract offer

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
